Package icyllis.arc3d.core

Class PixelMap

java.lang.Object
icyllis.arc3d.core.PixelMap
public class PixelMap extends Object
Immutable structure that pairs ImageInfo with pixels and row stride.

This class does not try to manage the lifetime of pixels, see PixelRef.

  • Constructor Details

    • PixelMap

      public PixelMap(@Nonnull ImageInfo info, @Nullable Object base, long address, int rowStride)
      Creates PixelMap from info width, height, AlphaType, ColorType and ColorSpace. rowStride should be info.width() times info.bytesPerPixel(), or larger.

      No parameter checking is performed; it is up to the caller to ensure that address and rowStride agree with info.

      The memory lifetime of pixels is managed by the caller.

      Parameters:
      info - width, height, AlphaType, ColorType and ColorSpace
      base - array if heap buffer; may be null
      address - address if native buffer, or array base offset; may be NULL
      rowStride - size of one row of buffer; width times bpp, or larger

    • PixelMap

      public PixelMap(@Nonnull ImageInfo newInfo, @Nonnull PixelMap oldPixelMap)
